heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly cloudy. Periods of light snow developing south and west of Interstate 89, a rising chance to the north and east; a trace to 2 inches. Highs from the mid teens to lower 20s, some mid 20s in the Hudson Valley. South to southeast winds 5 to 10 mph, except from the northeast in the St. Lawrence Valley.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly to partly cloudy. Snow likely early, then tapering off from west to east; another trace to an inch west of the Greens, and a trace to 2 inches from the Green Mountains eastward. Lows in the mid to upper teens in the south, and low to mid teens north, with some single digits far north. Winds becoming variable to southeast at around 5 mph.

heading: Tuesday
text: Partly cloudy in the morning, then clouds increasing in the afternoon. Chance of late-day snow showers, mainly west of the Greens. Highs from the mid 20s to around 30, except low to mid 30s in the Hudson Valley. Southeast winds 5 to 10 mph.
